timeline.message:
New packaging format

This new format is now created in a subdirectory in the target dir.

This also introduces a new faster ClassLoader than improves startup
time by around 10%.

timeline.bodyText: Not really important, but maybe base-lib should be called boot-lib to better reflect what it's about? base-lib sounds a little to generic
